content.description: The position as a function of time for two objects moving along a straight line is shown in the graph.
content.question: Which statement is true about the distances the two object have traveled at time <math alttext="t sub f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></math>?

choices.label: Object 1 has traveled a greater distance.
Object 2 has traveled a greater distance.
Both objects have traveled the same distance.
The total distance traveled by each object cannot be compared using the graph.

content.answer: Object 1 has traveled a greater distance.

topic.text: 1.1: Scalars and Vectors in One Dimension

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
